title: Pardon Mon Affaire 1976 movie
description: Charming French comedy was re-made scene-for-scene later as English language film, THE WOMAN IN RED.  As usual, the original French language version was much better than the English remake (IMO).  Beautiful Anny Duperey stars.  I have compressed the file size and included English subtitle file.  I use VideoLan to play the subtitles with the movie.  Please re-seed as I have limited hard drive space and cannot host forever.  Enjoy!
